item.title: ‘Nobody 2’ Star Sharon Stone Says Her Unhinged Villain Character Was Inspired by the ‘Cruelty’ of Social Media: ‘There’s a Lot of Pent-Up Feelings … That I Put on the Screen’
item.description: Bob Odenkirk sent Sharon Stone a note asking her to be in “Nobody 2” after they met for the first time at the Golden Globes. “She was kind to me, said hi to me and I thought, ‘Holy cow, Sharon Stone!’
